name: .ICBU File Extension
summary: Learn about .ICBU files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open ICBU files with Apple Calendar in macOS. To open an ICBU file with Calendar, select File → Import.
When restoring backups, Calendar overwrites all existing calendar data. The program prompts the user to overwrite the data before performing the operation.
Apple Calendar can convert ICBU files to .ICS files. To do so, open an ICBU file with Calendar and then select File → Export → Export.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
